ej,vazqj001,P,nauep901,Intentional HBP ej,ramia001,P,nauep901,Charging mound after HBP $Aramis Ramirez charged the mound and threw his helmet at pitcher Javier Vazquez after being HBP; the helmet missed; both benches emptied as Vazquez threw a wild punch at Ramirez and missed; both players were ejected by HP umpire Paul Nauert
